APPEARANCE.name: Jugemu Jugemu Unko Nageki Ototoi no Shin-chan no Pantsu Shinpachi no Jinsei Balmung Fezalion Issac Schneider Sanbun no Ichi no Junjou na Kanjou no Nokotta Sanbun no Ni wa Sakamuke ga Ki ni Naru Kanjou Uragiri wa Boku no Namae o Shitte Iru you de Shiranai no o Boku wa Shitte Iru Rusu Surume Medaka Kazunoko Koedame Medaka...... Kono Medaka wa Sakki to Chigau Yatsu Dakara Ikeno Medaka no Hou Dakara Raayu Yuuteimiyaoukimukou Pepepepepepepepepepepepe Oato ga Yoroshii you de Kore nite Oshimai Bichigusomaru
Kaiser Sougo de S Okita Sansei

description:
Gintama` starts off 2 years after the original series and pretty much continues the legacy of Gintama.
Somehow http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] and http://anidb.net/ch1167 [Hijikata] feel to have been "left behind" because everybody but themselves changed in those 2 years that they didn`t realize had been passed... or did they?
Note: Clarified by the man Gintoki himself at the beginning of episode 5, the title`s pronounciation is neither Gintama Dash or Gintama Dot, it`s simply Gintama. The little dot is just there for grown up reasons, because they grow hair down there and so on...

REGULAR.description: Shinpachi Shimura returns to the Yorozuya and discovers his friends drastically changed during the break. Feeling left behind, he returns home and discovers his sister, Tae Shimura, engaged to Isao Kondo. Tae and Kando enlists Shinpachi into the Shinsengumi and reveals that Tae is pregnant. Shinpachi runs to the ocean and laments the sudden changes of those around him. There, he learns about Kyubei Yagyu`s sex change to modify her life. They are interrupted by Kotaro Katsura who also changed his gender due to his and Kyubei`s characters` similarities.

titles.title: Everyone Looks a Little Grown Up After Spring Break
Haruyasumi Ake wa Mina Chotto Otona ni Mieru
春休み明けは皆ちょっと大人に見える

REGULAR.description: As Katsura and Kyubei fight for the title of the best transgendered, Shinpachi leaves to find that the Shinsengumi members also suffered a sudden change in their selves; Sogo Okita is the leader from the group and orders him and Toshiro Hijikata, Sagaru Yamazaki to attack the Yorozuya. As the three leave, Hijikata knocks out Yamazaki, as he was faking his change. He and Shinpachi learn that an invasion of parasite aliens is responsible for change to their friends and proceed to destroy them. However, they find problems in the outcome, and both Hijikata and and Shinpachi are knocked out in the process, with Gintoki being actually only person without a parasite.

titles.title: Everyone Looks Pretty Grown Up After Summer Break
Natsuyasumi Ake mo Mina Kekkou Otona ni Mieru
夏休み明けも皆けっこう大人に見える

REGULAR.description: As Gintoki complains of writing News Years cards, Yorozuya learn of what his friends have done over the holidays. He also receives cards saying his friends have gotten married, while they have lied and just Photoshopped the photos. The episode ends with Kondo, Sachan and Hasegawa telling their story of how they wrote a News Years card. The second part starts with the same opening, but Gin complains of the lack of chocolate. Kagura has a chocolate for Gintoki and Shinpachi, but is too embarrassed to give to them. She enlists the help of Otae, Sachan and Tsukuyo to help, but they are each too embarrassed to help her and make her give their chocolates to Gintoki. She indifferently give Gintoki and Shipachi the chocolate saying they were on the door step, as the happily run for the chocolate, they find all the chocolates were said to be from Kagura.

titles.title: Nengajou wa Fude Pen de Ike / Kakao yori Kokoro
Use a Calligraphy Pen for New Year Cards / The Heart Comes Before Chocolate
年賀状は筆ペンでいけ / カカオよりココロ

REGULAR.description: Yamazaki has a mental breakdown cause of Anpans and Kondo finally gets a date (Or does he!)

titles.title: Meals Should Be Balanced / We Are All Warriors in the Battle Against Fate
Shokuji wa Balance o Kangaero / Hito wa Minna Unmei to Tatakau Senshi
食事はバランスを考えろ / 人は皆運命と戦う戦士

REGULAR.description: Catherine appears to have a boyfriend and has drastically improved her appearance. Her boyfriend is a regular at Snack Otose, an entrepreneur by the name of Suejiro. Catherine decides to leave the Kabuki district to start a new bar with him.

titles.title: It`s Too Confusing When Talking About the Poster Girl for a Poster Store, So Call Her a Sandwich Board
Kanban`ya no Kanban Musume wa Mou Mendou Nande Nimai no Ita to Yobe
看板屋の看板娘はもう面倒なんで二枚の板と呼べ

REGULAR.description: The Odd Jobs` TV breaks out with Sachan inside. Gintoki tells Sadaharu to throw her away with the TV, but Sachan`s precious glasses are broken in the process. Gintoki reluctantly buys Sa-chan a new pair of glasses, but they are bottle bottom glasses that are clearly the wrong prescription. Sa-chan is overjoyed that Gintoki has given her a present, but the new glasses are responsible for a chain of failures on her assassination job. Her superiors now question her commitment.

titles.title: Glasses Are Part of the Soul
Megane wa Kokoro no Ichibu Desu
メガネは魂[こころ]の一部です

REGULAR.description: Gintoki and crew continue to defend Sarutobi against the Lethal Punishers. But against such assassins as the Pillow Masa, T-shirt Tatsu, and the Chuubert Chu Brothers, will they win?

titles.title: Glasses Prevent You From Seeing Certain Things
Megane Ja Mienai Mono ga Aru
メガネじゃ見えないものがある

REGULAR.description: Due to a lack of budget, the Yorozuya try to use old footage to make a filler episodes. While Hasegawa first plays a theme song, the characters then watch a fake trailer a supposed second film based on the series. The episode ends with a chapter of "Teach us Ginpachi-sensei", a story in which Gintoki is the teacher from high school class composed of anime`s characters.

titles.title: Itsumademo Aru to Omou na, Oya to Kane to Wakasa to Heya to Y-shirt to Watashi to Anata to Anime Gintama
Nothing Lasts Forever, Including Parents, Money, Youth, Your Room, Dress Shirts, Me, You, and the Gintama Anime
いつまでもあると思うな親と金と若さと部屋とYシャツと私とあなたとアニメ銀魂

REGULAR.description: Pirako Chin is looking for the strongest man in the Kabuki District. Now Gintoki has an underling who wants to turn Kabuki District into a garden of bright red flowers.

titles.title: A Lawless Town Tends to Attract a Bunch of Whoohooey Folk
Muhou no Machi ni Tsudou wa Kyahhou na Yatsu Bakari
無法の街に集うはキャッホーな奴ばかり

REGULAR.description: Pirako`s real plan is to help Jirocho, her father, take over the town.

titles.title: Ghosts Aren`t the Only Ones Who Run Wild Around Graveyards
Hakaba de Abareru no wa Yuurei dake de wa Nai
墓場で暴れるのは幽霊だけではない

REGULAR.description:
Pirako is pleased to hear that Otose, the reason for Jirocho`s attachment to the Kabuki district, has been eliminated.  With Otose gone, the balance of power among the Four Devas has crumbled and a war is in the works in the Kabuki district.
Meanwhile, the Odd Jobs crew is watching over Otose when Saigo appears and informs them that the bar will be destroyed by the Four Devas.  He urges them to leave this town, now that they`ve lost their home...Finally, the day comes for them to leave Snack Otose.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chains of a Warrior
Otoko no Kusari
侠の鎖

REGULAR.description: Tama, Tatsumi, Tetsuko, Kozen, Madao, Kyoshiro. Everybody is out in full force to fight for the Kabuki District. Male escorts vs. trannies, Cabaret girls vs. Yakuza, robots blowing things up. It’s an all-out war!

titles.title: Iron Town
Tetsu no Machi
鉄の街

REGULAR.description: Jirocho and Gin battle Kada`s elite Harusame forces while the rest of the denizens of Kabuki-cho take on her main forces in the streets. Kada is utterly stunned when her elite forces are beat by just these two humans, and flees the scene. Gin then helps Jirocho resolve his issues regarding Tatsugoro; Otose and Jirocho reconcile at the hospital. Outside the hospital, Kada desperately launches one last feeble attempt at conquering Kabuki-cho, but is stopped in her tracks by Pirako and the Yorozuya - Kada settles for swearing that the Harusame will be back, and flees yet again. At the very end, Jirocho denounces all other names he has ever been called except for Father of Pirako, and goes with his daughter back to the country.

titles.title: Ohikaenasutte!
`Tis An Honor!
お控えなすって!

REGULAR.description: Kagura`s older brother, Kamui, visits Kada`s cell where she is being kept after having been captured by the Kiheitai and loses at a game of odds or evens. He is approached by one of the 12 captains who tells him he has the 12 captains support if he chooses to overthrow Admiral Abo. Kamui orders his second to kill the members of the Kiheitai, isolating Takasugi so Kamui can duel him. As the Kiheitai`s ship is about to be attacked the Admiral double crosses Kamui and imprisons him out of fear. Takasugi visits Kada`s cell and loses at a game of odds or evens. After a brief conversation Takasugi rescues Kamui at his execution, overthrowing Admiral Abo. Kamui becomes Admiral and the episode ends with Takasugi visiting Kada`s cell one last time to lose at a game of odds or evens.

titles.title: Chou ka Han ka
Odds or Evens
丁か半か

REGULAR.description: Kagura invites a bunch of kids to the Yorozuya. They, along with other characters get shunned by them and invites them into a "factory tour".

titles.title: I Can`t Remember a Damn Thing About the Factory Tour
Koujou Kengaku to ka Shoujiki Hitotsutari to mo Kioku ni Nokotte ne?
工場見学とか正直一つたりとも記憶に残ってねェ

REGULAR.description: Gintoki and Hasegawa have to help the shogun when he is at the pool.

titles.title: Ni-Do Aru Koto wa San-Do Aru
What Happens Twice Can Happen Thrice
二度あることは三度ある

REGULAR.description: Otose sent a box of crab to the Yoruzuya. Before they can divide the crab`s legs to themselves, suddenly, there came a blackout after the electricity came back one leg is missing and Gintoki ate it. Another blackout came and another leg was missing and Kagura ate it, saying she was attacked by a gorilla. Shinpachi then put up a candle. Then Gintoki and Kagura ate all of the legs. When Shinpachi claims the crab`s whole body they found themselves fighting for a crab congee and ended up eating crab-flavored cheap food.

titles.title: Kani no Hasami wa Kizuna o Tatsu Hasami
The Pincers of a Crab Can Snip Through a Friendship
カニのハサミは絆を断つハサミ

REGULAR.description: Kagura helps a iwamatsu, the last part have the yoruzuya and shinsengumi in the bathhouse just as neighbor Hedero arrives with family members visiting Edo.

titles.title: Hito wa Shiranai Uchi ni Kari Park to Iu Tsumi o Okashite Iru
People Forget to Return Stuff All the Time Without Even Realizing It
人はしらないうちに借りパクという罪を犯している

REGULAR.description: Gin, Kondo, Hijkata, Okita, and Shin are stuck in the public bath with the demons. Every lie they tell digs their grave deeper. Can they really get away with kicking heads in, ripping off horns, and setting demons on fire with lotion?

titles.title: Sentou de wa Shin mo Maruhadaka
The Bathhouse, Where You`re Naked in Body and Soul
銭湯では身も心も丸裸

REGULAR.description: The monkey, aka "Jugem Jugem... (abbreviated) Runny Diarrhea," has grown close to Kyubei. However, their time together did not last. The Shogun family ordered that the Yagyu return Runny Diarrhea. The monkey escapes from the Shogun family to see Kyubei again. Kyubei and the other Yagyu members are forced to continue a desperate and fruitless search for Runny Diarrhea.

titles.title: Jugem
Jugemu
寿限無

REGULAR.description:
The monkey, aka "Jugem Jugem... (abbreviated) Runny Diarrhea," has grown close to Kyubei.  However, their time together did not last.  The Shogun family ordered that the Yagyu return Runny Diarrhea.  The monkey escapes from the Shogun family to see Kyubei again.  Kyubei and the other Yagyu members are forced to continue a desperate and fruitless search for Runny Diarrhea...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Na wa Tai o Arawasu
The Name Reveals the Person
名は体を表す

REGULAR.description: Katsura infiltrates Matsudaira`s household and ends up pondering family values.

titles.title: Ossan no Katei Jijou wa Daibu Hard Heart wa Soft
The Man`s Household Situation is Hard, His Heart is Soft
おっさんの家庭事情はハード ハートはソフト

REGULAR.description: The Yorozuya run into a mysterious Blu-ray DVD with a depressed female ghost in it. The ghost moves into their TV, making all the programs gloomy as well. Gintoki then attempts to find use for the ghost as a navigator.

titles.title: Aka to Ao no Ecstasy
Blue and Red Ecstasy
青と赤のエクスタシー

REGULAR.description: Gintoki gets thrown in prison after being framed, and while he`s made an enemy of the warden, he`s managed to become the boss of the prisoners. With his underling Shachi in tow, Gintoki skips his menial labor duties to search the warden`s room for anything incriminating. Understanding that the punishment will be fatal if they are caught, Gintoki disguises himself by putting on pajamas...

titles.title: Prison Break Season 2 tte Tashika ni Mou Prison Break Shiteru kedo Are wa Kono Kusatta Shakai ga Prison tte Koto Dakara Prison Break de Iin Da yo
So in the Second Season of Prison Break, They`re Already Broken Out of Prison, But the Name Works Once You Realize That Society is a Prison
プ○ズンブ×イクシーズン2って確かにもうプリ××ブレ○クしてるけどあれはこの腐った社会がプリズンってことだからプ○ズンブ×イクでいいんだよ

REGULAR.description: Gintoki continues creating havoc in the prison.

titles.title: Everybody Loves Pajamas
Hito wa Mina Pajamakko
人は皆パジャマっ子

REGULAR.description:
This episode is a sidestory!  Gintama has been involved in many (one-sided) crossovers.  This time, they`re working with the Jump comedy manga Sket Dance!  An episodic anime that airs on Thursdays at 6 PM about a group of three odd jobbers with plenty of laughs and tears...  Sounds very similar to Gintama.  As Gintoki warns that the Sket Dan is coming after Gintama, the Sket Dan members appear and offer a challenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Korabo ni wa Alien vs Predator ga Aru no mo Oboeteoke
Speaking of Crossovers, Don`t Forget About Alien vs. Predator
コラボにはエイリ○ンVSプ×デターがあるのも覚えておけ

REGULAR.description:
Shinpachi introduces his new girlfriend to Otae...but she turns out to be Momo-san, a character from the popular Love Choris game.  There are more and more boys in Edo who can no longer distinguish game from reality like Shinpachi.  Otae asks Gintoki to bring Shinpachi back to the real world.  The only way is by entering the world of Love Choris and talking some sense into him.  Gintoki ends up choosing a very unique heroine to be his girlfriend...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai ni Plus mo Minus mo Nashi
Love is Neither Plus Nor Minus
愛にプラスもマイナスもなし

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki is participating in the My Wife World Tournament so he can cure Shinpachi of his addiction to the romance simulation game Love Choris.  The tournament involves in-game dates with the heroines.  In the Momo group, Shinpachi uses a passive approach to dominate the other players!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Making It Through Love
Wataru Seken wa Ai Bakari
渡る世間は愛ばかり

REGULAR.description:
Kagura begs Gintoki for a cell phone, but the tight Odd Jobs budget won`t allow for one.  That`s when they discover three cell phones in Sadaharu`s poop!  They immediately have the technical whiz Gengai fix the phones and each member gets one.  Kagura is ecstatic to have a cell phone, but Gintoki and Shinpachi are annoyed by her incessant texting...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Would Take Too Much Effort to Make This Title Sound Like a Text Message Subject
Koko no Title mo Mail no Title Mitai na Toko mo Kangaeru no Mendokusae
ここのタイトルもメールのタイトルみたいなトコも考えるのメンド臭え

REGULAR.description:
Odd Jobs attends the funeral for the owner of the restaurant they frequented.  A few Shinsengumi members are also present.  Gintoki and Hijikata, known for their bizarre sense of taste, lament the loss of one of Edo`s treasures...  As the funeral proceeds, the dead owner suddenly makes a move!!  Only Gintoki and Hijikata can see him...  But when they try to escape from the owner...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Soushiki tte Hajimete Iku to Igai to Minna Akarukute Bikkuri suru
When You Go to a Funeral For the First Time, You`re Surprised by How Happy the People Are
葬式って初めていくと意外とみんな明るくてビックリする

REGULAR.description:
Elizabeth vanishes, leaving behind a sign that says "Don`t look."  Katsura asks Odd Jobs to help look for him, but then he remembers that it`s been a year since he last saw Elizabeth.  He never even realized that Elizabeth had left home!  They decide to go to Katsura`s home to search for clues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The People You Tend to Forget Tend to Show Up After You Forget Them
Wasureppoi Yatsu wa Wasureta Koro ni Yattekuru
忘れっぽい奴は忘れた頃にやってくる

REGULAR.description:
Katsura and the Odd Jobs members learn the truth about Elizabeth`s disappearance from his former lover, Fumiko.  He was actually a spy from the legendary mercenary tribe, the Renho.  Fumiko asks them to protect Earth and Elizabeth from the Renho.  Meanwhile, a strange rain is turning the faces of the people of Edo with Elizabeth faces who can only communicate with signs!  The invasion of the Renho army has begun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Space Ururun Homestay
Uchuu Bururun Taizaiki
宇宙ブルルン滞在記

REGULAR.description:
Odd Jobs, Katsura, and Sakamoto disguise themselves as Renho to join Fumiko in infiltrating the enemy base.  Dark Vader, feared by all as the evil lord, plans to use the Renho`s anti-samurai Gunsams to attack while the people of Earth are distracted by the rain.  Gintoki and the others must stop the invasion of Earth before it`s too late, but instead they appear to be bonding with the Renho.  That is when Elizabeth, General Eren, appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Piggy Banks and Trash Cans
Senryoubako to Garakuta no Hako
千両箱とガラクタの箱

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and Sakamoto reveal themselves and attack the Double Dragon generals.  Meanwhile, Elizabeth has launched in the Gunsam to battle Dark Vader in a duel to the death.  Elizabeth is helpless against Dark Vader.  That is when Katsura arrives to protect his friend`s back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Empty Planet
Kara no Hoshi
空の星

REGULAR.description:
Gintoki and co have launched in the Galactic Merchant Fleet Robot Kaien to take out Dark Vader.  Having made peace with the Renho, they now fight for their pride as Earthlings and samurai against Dark Vader, who has become one with the Renho home planet.  Will they be able to restore peace to the universe?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Say Goodbye Lionel Will You Survive
Sayonara Lionel Nanka Iwasenai
さよなライオネルなんか言わせない

REGULAR.description:
Matsudaira forces the Shinsengumi to take a vacation to the ski slopes.  He tells them to enjoy their time off, but in reality, they`ve been sent to guard the Shogun on his first snowboard trip.  The Shinsengumi members are doing their best to protect the Shogun since their lives are on the line, but then they run into some familiar faces...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Please Take Me Skiing
Sessha o Ski ni Tsuretette
拙者をスキーにつれてって

REGULAR.description:
The Shinsengumi is tricked into escorting the Shogun on his first snowboarding trip.  Then they run into the Odd Jobs members.  Yada yada, everybody`s stranded in the middle of the mountains, plus the Shogun is missing.  Hijikata orders a search for the Shogun while securing warm shelter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vacation in Disorientation
Ian Ryokou wa Iyan Doko!?
慰安旅行はイヤンどこォ!?

REGULAR.description:
It`s a year-end party at Odd Jobs!  The Gintama anime has been through a lot, but Gintoki tells Kagura and Shinpachi to keep it cool.  And then the usual members join in for some real partying... The next morning, Gintoki wakes up to discover that he`s made some very bad mistakes. Will Gin-san be able to survive the worst blunder in five years of Gintama!?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bounenkai Demo Wasurecha Ikenai Mono ga Aru
You know those year-end parties where you keep drinking until you`ve forgotten everything that happened the past year? There are a few things you`re not supposed to forget
忘年会でも忘れちゃいけないものがある

REGULAR.description:
After getting drunk at the year-end party, Gintoki managed to become a six-timer in one night. In order to prevent the show from being pulled off the air, Gintoki is forced into engaging in a relationship with all of them.  And now he has to go on dates with all of them at the same time...!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hito wa Wasureru Koto de Ikite Ikeru
People can Only Live by Forgetting the Bad
人は忘れることで生きていける

REGULAR.description:
The number one host in the Kabuki district, Kyoshiro, summons the Odd Jobs members to his club, Takamagahara, and tells them that he intends to quit because of a lady named Madame Yagami who controls the night world.  It seems that she declared she would be making a second visit to Takamagahara, which is essentially a death sentence.  The hosts at Kyoshiro`s have quit out of fear, so Gintoki and co must find hosts to handle the Madame...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alphabet Hyouki de Jinrui Mina Host
We Are All Hosts, in Capital Letters
アルファベット表記で人類みなホスト

REGULAR.description:
The Madame`s arrival is imminent.  Kyoshiro, Gintoki, and friends attempt to scout some help, but they end up with a bunch of oddballs.  And it turns out that Otae has invited guests from all over town who go wild and leave the bar and Kyoshiro broken!  There`s no time to worry about taking care of customers.  But at the worst possible time, Madame Yagami arrives!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Girls Like Vegeta, Guys Like Piccolo
Onna wa Vegeta-zuki Otoko wa Piccolo-zuki
女はベジータ好き 男はピッコロ好き

REGULAR.description:
Jellybeans Vanguard Honda is on his fifth year as a Jump editor.  However, he`s been assigned to the manga Gintaman, which has driven multiple editors insane.  In order to save himself, Honda must find a new talented artist so he can be reassigned.  One day, he is visited by an aspiring manga artist by the name of N3016.  Is this artist as juvenile as his name suggests?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Draw Your Life on the Canvas We Call Manga
Manga Toiu Gafu ni Jinsei Toiu Fude de eo Egake
漫画という画布に人生という筆で絵を描け

REGULAR.description:
The Sasaki family is as elite as it gets, and one of its members, Tetsunosuke, has joined the Shinsengumi.  He would have joined the Mimawarigumi, a police force with pedigree, but he is considered a troublemaker, which is why he was sent to the Shinsengumi.  Kondo assigns Tetsu to Hijikata as an assistant, so Hijikata is forced to endure the new recruit...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Check It Out!!
Chekera!!
チェケラ!!

REGULAR.description:
Tetsunosuke has completely changed as he sincerely tries to perform his new job.  Isaburo despises Tetsunosuke and tells Hijikata that he should dispose of him, but Hijikata, who came from a similar background, sympathizes with Tetsunosuke and looks after him.  Meanwhile, Gintoki, who was arrested by the Mimawarigumi, has been assigned a mission by Isaburo...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ibaragaki to Baragaki
Thorny and Rosy
茨ガキと薔薇ガキ

REGULAR.description:
Tetsunosuke has been ordered to deliver a letter for Hijikata.  However, he`s captured by the radical Joi Check It Out gang in the process.  Tetsunosuke had concealed his identity to join the gang, but now they know that he has connections to the police.  He`s taken hostage as leverage over the Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi.  However, the Mimawarigumi shows no concern for the hostage and plots to place the blame squarely on the Shinsengumi.  Hijikata and the other members are enraged after learning Isaburo`s plans.  The Shinsengumi and Mimawarigumi are now in an all-out fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Festival of Thornys
Warugaki-domo no Saiten
悪ガキどもの祭典

REGULAR.description:
The Shinsengumi attempt to save Tetsunosuke from the Check It Out gang, but the Mimawarigumi stands in the way.  Neither side is willing to back down, but Gintoki, who had infiltrated the gang as a Mimawarigumi spy, manages to save Tetsunosuke! Kondo orders the Shinsengumi to begin fighting back!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baragaki kara no Tegami
Letter from Thorny
バラガキからの手紙

REGULAR.description:
The middle-aged dumb-ass oldie, or Madao, Taizo Hasegawa finds himself on a game show with a chance to win ten million yen. Will he be able to endure the pressure and become a Madaonaire!?  And what is Madao`s motivation for participating in the game show...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Madaodog Madaonaire
Madaodog Madaonaire
マダオドッグマダオネア

REGULAR.description:
A character from 2 years ago is back with a request for Gin.  This favor will take the Odd-Job Trio right in the middle of Satan Festival in this very special Christmas episode.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Okurimono wa Ohayame ni
Presents Are Meant to Be Given Early
贈り物はお早めに

REGULAR.description:
Gin is trying to hand out New Year Envelopes but the lack of children characters make it hard.  To make matters worse, everyone seems to have their mind wrapped around long cylindrical objects and small spherical objects.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Year`s Envelopes Are Perfect for Dirty Jokes
Otoshidama wa Neta to no Aishou ga Batsugun
お年玉は×ネタとの相性がバツグン

REGULAR.description:
Nobody cares anymore, the animators, producers, not even Hideaki Sorachi.  Aww, it’s such a drag even the characters are airing their grievances.  Where do we go from here?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotatsu de Neru Toki wa Kintama Nesshinai You Ki o Tsukero
When Sleeping Under a Kotatsu, Make Sure You Don`t Burn Your Balls
コタツで寝る時は○玉熱しないよう気をつけろ

REGULAR.description:
Its last episode and we are going out with a bang.  A Gintama clip show!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gomennasai
We`re Sorry
ごめんなさい
